name: authenticated-document-uploader
description: Complete document upload system with JWT authentication

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --code-coverage
